ygData.subject: Stop Dragon my heart around.
ygData.msgSnippet: The Earth blackened in an eclipse in the shape of a dragon as a scaley creature flew across the sky. Animals looked up in submission at the immaculate being

Subject: Stop Dragon my heart around.

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>


The Earth blackened in an eclipse in the shape of a dragon as a scaley
creature flew across the sky. Animals looked up in submission at the
immaculate being above them. Trees seemed to bow in his wake as he roared
by. He was a being of reconing, poetry in the sky. He was a creature that
struck fear in the sparks of all evildoers, A creature whos snarl makes
things extinct, a bot of might, glory, pain, and anguish. (Not to mention an
ego the size of cybertron.) Necromancer flew through the sky at one with
nature. He could sense the world around him, everything was one with him,
when Earth wept, he wept, when the Earth grew, he grew. When the planet
bled, He made the ones responsible bleed.

He landed outside the location of the repairs for the Ark. (Let me know if
the defenses react.) The great dragon roared at the devastation the war
caused. He could smell the wildcats somewhere around. He transformed into
his less threatening bot mode and approached. His link flashed with
information about the meeting. He clicked off the frequency and proceeded to
the construction site.Even in his bot mode he was of considerable height and
stature. The last thing he wanted was to be cooped up in a room full of
diplomats.
